title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on 
Assembly of Live Birds) Regulations 2021 and come into operation on 17 
November 2021.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited avian influenza (restriction assembly live birds) regulation 2021 come operation 17 november 2021

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on
heading: 2. A person shall not-
text_raw:
2. A person shall not- 

(a) organise or take part in an event which involves assembling 

birds, 

(b) 

(c) 

sell or supply a live bird at a fair, market, mart or other 
gathering, or 

have a live bird in his or her possession or under his and her 
control at an event to which paragraph (1) or (2) relates.
text_norm: 2 person shall not- (a) organise take part event involves assembling bird (b) (c) sell supply live bird fair market mart gathering live bird possession control event paragraph (1) (2) relates

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on
heading: 3. Regulation 2 does not apply to the assembly of pigeons for racing and
text_raw:
3. Regulation 2 does not apply to the assembly of pigeons for racing and 

associated purposes.

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on
heading: 4. Regulation 2 is a penal provision to which section 36 (4) (b) of the
text_raw:
4. Regulation 2 is a penal provision to which section 36 (4) (b) of the 

Animal Health and Welfare Act 2013 applies. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal of the Minister for 
Agriculture, Food and the Marine, 

15 November, 2021. 

BRENDAN GLEESON, 

An officer authorised to authenticate the official Seal of 
the Minister. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 19th November, 2021. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [592] 3

title: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the Avian Influenza (Restriction on
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These regulations provide for restrictions on the assembly of live birds as a 
precautionary measure against risk of avian influenza. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [592]
